categories: Category:Commerce and labor guilds and unions

nodes.text: The Orbital Transports Union was a union that operated on the planet Corulag. After a set of new berthing taxes were implemented on Corulag, the union's members went on strike, which caused the world's economy to stall, and in an attempt to bring the prostest to an end, the planetary leader Zafiel Snopps hired a gang of thugs to attack the union. Following a number of violent encounters with the gang, the union's leaders hired a group of agents to intervene and bring the protest to a peaceful resolution.
